name: Yuxuan Tian
bio: Hi, I am the lead organizer of NJ MEGA Hack 2022. Glad to meet you guys and good luck!

name: Noah Trupin
bio: I'm a highschool student with a passion for programming and talking about programming. I built Mega Hack's original website.

name: Jamie Nicholson
bio: Hi! I'm Jamie Nicholson, and I'm a senior at the Lawrenceville School. I am currently the president of our Programming Club, and am so excited to help organize this Hackathon!

name: Promit Mukhopadhyay
bio: I animate posters and other designs created by our artists.

name: Agni Rajinikanth
bio: Agni is a Junior from New Jersey. He is experienced and skilled at Economics, Business, Machine Learning and Engineering.

name: Ishan Parikh
bio: Hello, I am ishan and I help with the marketing and graphic designs for Mega Hack 2022! I am 14 and attend Rutgers Prep.

name: Adit Trivedi
bio: I make email templates that the heads check over before seding the email to other ngos and partners.
